20-0117.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Special Meeting held Tuesday, January 14, 2020.Page 1 of 3411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS/LOUNGE, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, FEBRUARY 11, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESA motion was made by Chair Richardson, seconded by Commissioner Zendejas, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Zendejas, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Tanzer, Pearce and RichardsonAbsent: 2 - Andrews and Hudson2.

20-0118.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Reports for November 2019.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Uranga, seconded by Vice Chair Pearce, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Zendejas, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Tanzer, Pearce and RichardsonAbsent: 2 - Andrews and Hudson3.

20-0119.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the presentation of the 2019 Housing Authority Family Self-Sufficiency Graduates.  (Citywide)Alison King, Deputy Executive Director spoke; and introduced Victoria Moon Frye, Community Program Tech.Victoria Moon Frye, Community Program Tech, spoke; and presented the staff report.Allison King, Deputy Executive Director; spoke.Chair Richardson spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Uranga, seconded by Chair Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Zendejas, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Tanzer, Pearce and RichardsonAbsent: 2 - Andrews and HudsonPage 2 of 3411 W.
